chunks.episode_title: 第二季終一天10分鐘 英語說得通介紹家鄉特色Talk about one of the good things in your hometown.
chunks.chunk_text: 歡迎收聽口說英語通我是騎兵老師In this unit, we are going to talk about good things in your hometown這個單元裡面我們要來討論你會推薦你家鄉的什麼東西給外國的朋友呢那我們趕快就來聽一下這個單元的問題以及我們的回答

chunks.episode_title: 第二季終一天10分鐘 英語說得通介紹家鄉特色Talk about one of the good things in your hometown.
chunks.chunk_text: I think my favorite dish would probably be Taiwanese popcorn chicken which is crispy and flavorful.It's basically little pieces of fried chicken with basil leaves.Pepper salt and chili powder are added to give the chicken an extra flavor.It's really great snack food and I really love to eat it.

chunks.chunk_text: 某人物的其中特色之一你就可以用這樣的句型第二個句型it's really hard not to後面加上動詞這個地方it是一個虛主詞它代替後面的to加v不定詞不過這邊的to加v前面有一個not所以是否定不定詞意思就是不做什麼事這真的很難
